HELPFUL HINT 1: To do a search with Moon+ Reader Pro for the epub file I did the following: Tap middle of screen (to bring up the Options) > Tap Preferences (little wheel, bottom right of screen) > Tap More Options > Tap Search (third one down in list).  

Not sure why Search is so buried with this app.
HELPFUL HINT 2: With Moon+ Reader and Aldiko Premium for Android to return to ebook after tapping website links from within the ebook you can just tap on your return arrow bottom of screen.
